ing: 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRANDÂ® Sweetened Condensed Milk
des: "Keep some condensed milk on hand for cold days, and whip up a batch of this rich hot chocolate warm your loved ones."
ins: In large saucepan over medium heat, combine sweetened condensed milk, cocoa, vanilla and salt; mix well. Slowly stir in water.  Heat through, stirring occasionally.  Do not boil.  Top with marshmallows, (optional).  Store covered in refrigerator.
